answers.answer: Hi Mark, The drugs your on are your problem, have you thought of controling it by diet, if you can get that to work your be better off and after some time should start getting your erections back, see how that goes then your penis comes back to life see if you still have the bend.Good Luck
Thank you Nohard for your advice, it is something I am going to consider.
Hi Mark, You can google for diet to help you, I know it works, as I had a work mate in the UK who did it.Good Luck

question: I have Type 2 diabetes for about 7 years and am on 4 Metformin(500mg) daily. About 3 years ago I started to have erection problems which gradually got worse  until the point, where I now can't have an erection. My doctor has given me several types of tablets including Viagra, all to no avail. I quite often feel a dull pain at the base of my penis and it feels a little irregular when I squeeze it, almost as if it is damaged. Also in the latter stages of being able to have an erection there appeared to be a fairly severe bend in my penis which I never experienced before. Thanking you, Mark
title: Mark
